purpleculture_info:
(Trad.: 彫, 雕, 鵰)
Pictophonetic: 周 indicates the sound; 隹 (bird) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
雕塑 [ diāo sù ]: a statue; a Buddhist image; sculpture; to carve
雕刻 [ diāo kè ]: to carve; to engrave; carving
雕像 [ diāo xiàng ]: sculpture; (carved) statue; Classifiers: 尊
浮雕 [ fú diāo ]: relief sculpture
石雕 [ shí diāo ]: stone carving; carved sculpture
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right

    • 隹 [ zhuī ] short-tailed bird; sparrow
heisig_chinese_memo: The hardest part about making a turkey sculpture is getting the circumference of its little head right.

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The hardest part about making a turkey sculpture is getting the circumference of its little head right.
humanum_short_description_en: "Shuowen": "Sculpture, 鷻也. Cong Yu Zhou Sheng. Carving, Laiwen carving from the bird." See " Carving ".
humanum_short_description: 《說文》：「雕，鷻也。從隹周聲。鵰，籒文雕從鳥。」參見「鵰」。

HSK 6: 雕,叼
彫彫RS
雕雕 		carve, decorate, emaciated
  • marks 彡 in a circle 周: carved decoration
(Trad.: 彫, 雕, 鵰)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 周 indicates the sound; 隹 (bird) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 周 [ zhōu ] Zhou dynasty; circumference
    • 隹 [ zhuī ] short-tailed bird; sparrow
①鸟类的一属，大型猛禽，羽毛褐色，上嘴勾曲，视力很强，利爪，能捕食山羊、野兔等(亦作“鹫”)：雕悍。一箭双雕。
②刻竹、木、玉、石、金属等：木雕。浮雕。玉雕。雕版。雕龙(指善于撰写文章)。雕镌。雕塑。雕虫小技。
③有彩绘装饰的：雕弓。雕鞍。雕青(在人体上刺花纹，涂上青色)。
④同“凋”。
雕塑 [ diāo sù ]: a statue; a Buddhist image; sculpture; to carve
雕刻 [ diāo kè ]: to carve; to engrave; carving
雕像 [ diāo xiàng ]: sculpture; (carved) statue; Classifiers: 尊
(Trad.: 彫, 雕, 鵰)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 周 indicates the sound; 隹 (bird) conveys the meaning.

Chinese: The hardest part about making a turkey sculpture is getting the circumference of its little head right.
Meaning: sculpture
Hanzi: 鵰
Story: The hardest part about making a turkey sculpture is getting the circumference of its little head right.
Kind: both

Related Character(s): 鵰

雕字的基本解释

雕
diāo
鸟类的一属，大型猛禽，羽毛褐色，上嘴勾曲，视力很强，利爪，能捕食山羊、野兔等（亦作“鹫”）：雕悍。一箭双雕。
刻竹、木、玉、石、金属等：木雕。浮雕。玉雕。雕版。雕龙（指善于撰写文章）。雕镌。雕塑。雕虫小技。
有彩绘装饰的：雕弓。雕鞍。雕青（在人体上刺花纹，涂上青色）。
同“凋”。

雕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［diāo］
［《廣韻》都聊切，平蕭，端。］
“敦8”的被通假字。亦作“錭1”。
(1)同“鵰”。一种大型猛禽。嘴呈钩状，视力很强，腿部羽毛直达趾间，雌雄同色。也叫鹫。
(2)引申为凶猛。参见“雕捍”。
(3)治玉。后亦写作“琱”。
(4)泛指雕刻、雕琢。
(5)引申为剔去。
(6)饰以彩绘、花纹。后亦写作“彫”。
(7)引申为有花纹，有纹彩。
(8)泛指修饰。
(9)浮华，虚夸。参见“雕俗”。
(10)“凋”的古字。凋零；凋谢。
(11)“碉”的古字。石室。
(12)用同“刁”。狡猾。
(13)用同“叼”。用嘴夹住。
(14)姓。汉有雕延年。见《汉书·功臣表》。

雕字的英文翻译

◎ 雕
carve, engrave, vulture

雕字的康熙字典解释
雕字的源字形

雕字的起名意思

：指敏锐、强大、勇猛的意思。

Carving
Basic explanation of words
Carving
diāo
A genus of birds, large birds of prey, brown feathers, curved upper beaks, strong eyesight, sharp claws, can prey on goats, hares, etc. (also known as "eagles"): carved and fierce. Kill two birds with one stone.
Carving bamboo, wood, jade, stone, metal, etc.: wood carving. Relief. jade carving. Engraving. Diaolong (referring to good at writing articles). Carved engraving. sculpture. Carving tricks.
There are painted decorations: carved bows. Carved saddle. Carved green (sting patterns on the human body and paint them in blue).
Same as "withered".
Carving
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［diāo］
["Guangyun" all talk and cut, Pingxiao, Duan. ]
"Dun 8" was passed falsely. Also known as "錭1".
(1) Same as "carving". A large bird of prey. The mouth is hook-shaped, and the eyesight is very strong. The feathers on the legs reach between the toes, and the male and female are of the same color. Also called eagle.
(2) The extension is ferocious. See "Sculpture".
(3) Zhiyu. Later it was also written as "琱".
(4) Generally refers to carving and carving.
(5) The extension is to eliminate.
(6) Decorated with colored paintings and patterns. Later it was also written as "Diao".
(7) The extension is that there are patterns and patterns.
(8) Broadly refers to modification.
(9) Flashy, boastful. See "carving custom".
(10) The ancient word for "withered". Withered; withered.
(11) The ancient character of "diao". Stone room.
(12) Use the same as "Diao". cunning.
(13) Use the same as "diao". Clamp it with your mouth.
(14) Last name. There are carvings in the Han Dynasty. See "Han Shu · Meritorious Table".
Carving
English translation of words
◎ Carved
carve, engrave, vulture
Carving
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
Carving
Source glyph
Carving
Name meaning
: It means sharp, strong, and brave.
会意字。从佳,其古文字形体像鸟;从周,表示雕眼睛敏锐,观察细密、周全。本义是一种鹰类猛禽,又称。
①鹰类猛禽,也叫鹫:山~「金~|一箭双~。2雕刻:~
花|~琢|~塑。③有彩画装饰的:~弓|~砌|~梁画栋。
4刻成的艺术品:浮~|牙~「冰~。

Цунцзя, его древние персонажи подобны птицам; Цун Чжоу, это означает, что резные глаза острые, а наблюдение подробное и тщательное.
Первоначальное значение - это разновидность орла-хищника, также известного как.

diāo
гл.
1) вырезать, гравировать; гранить; ваять; резной, гравированный
朽木不可雕 гнилое дерево не годится для резьбы
雕玉 резать по яшме; резная яшма, граненый самоцвет
雕楹 резные пилястры
2) украшать, приукрашивать; расписывать; изукрашенный, расписной
雕笼 изукрашенная клетка (для птиц)
雕伪 приукрашать ложь (фальшь)
3) блёкнуть, увядать; сохнуть, чахнуть, хиреть, приходить в упадок (запустение); вялый, блёклый
雕叶 вялый (блёклый) лист
4) беркут, орёл
